menu.filter.category-search.error-citize: There has been a problem getting citizens' data. Try again later please.
menu.filter.category-search.empty-offici: There is no official data with the specified parameters.
menu.filter.category-search.empty-citize: There is no citizens' data with the specified parameters.
menu.filter.category-search.no-category-: Please select a category to apply this filter.
menu.filter.empty-results-info-alert-pop: There are no points of interest with the specified parameters.
menu.filter.location-search.empty-offici: There is no official data near the specified location.
menu.filter.location-search.empty-citize: There is no citizens' data near the specified location.
menu.filter.location-search.unselected-a: You must select a location from the list of suggestions to enable this filter.
menu.filter.location-search.text-empty.i: You must introduce a text to enable this filter.
menu.filter.location-search.error-popup-: The app has not been able to get your location, check that it is activated on your device.

map-page.aac-error-popup-text: Please log in to create new points of interest.
poi-details.title: Details
poi-details.error-popup-text: There was an error getting the details of the point of interest. Try again later please.
poi-create-page.title: New POI
poi-create-page.request-text: Please, fill in next form to send a new point of interest:
poi-create-page.title-too-long-error-lab: The name is too long (300 characters at most)!
poi-create-page.description-placeholder: e.g., This bar offers 'pintxo-pote' every Thursday from 7:00 pm o'clock to...
poi-create-page.form.url-validation-erro: It is not a valid web address!
poi-create-page.email-validation-error-l: It is not a valid email address!
poi-create-page.tfn-validation-error-lab: The phone number must have 9 digits! Optionally you can enter the country code with the formats '+34' or '0034'.
poi-create-page.map-validation-required-: You must select a location! You can search it by text or by selecting a point on the map directly.
poi-create-page.map-validation-bounds-er: The location must be in the area of Bilbao!
poi-create-page.form.advert-label: The fields marked with an '*' are required.
poi-create-page.form.info-citizens-filte: The filter to see citizens' POI will be activated automatically when sending a new one.
poi-create-page.info-alert-popup-label: The point of interest has been successfully registered.
poi-create-page.info-alert-popup-label-n: The point of interest has been successfully registered (select the appropriate category to see the created point).
poi-create-page.location-gmaps-error-pop: There has been a problem getting the coordinates of the selected location! Please try again.
poi-create-page.error-popup-text: There has been a problem registering the new point of interest.
login.title: Login
login.text: Share points of interest with other citizens.
login.error-popup-text: There has been a problem logging in WeLive. Please, try again later.
about-page.title: About
about-page.subtitle: Information and terms of use
about-page.text-1: BilbOn lets you know the location of the different public services the city of Bilbao offers, such as bus stops, metro, taxi, pharmacies, public buildings, services, mailboxes, dumpsters... Bilbon offers a broad public catalog of points of interest aimed at both tourists and citizens.
about-page.text-2: In addition, BilbOn permits you to become content creator, allowing you the creation of new points of interest. These points of interest will be approved and published by the corresponding responsible.
about-page.text-3: BilbOn has been created in the joint framework of urban services of the European Project WeLive. The WeLive project has been funded within the H2020 Programme of the European Commission for Research, Technological Development and Innovation, under agreement number 645845
about-page.text-4: More information about the project at http://www.welive.eu.
about.questionnaire.basque-not-supported: Basque is not supported by the questionnaire.
about.questionnaire.succesfully-submitte: The questionnaire has been sent successfully.
about.questionnaire.submitted-error-labe: Error while sending the questionnaire. Please, try again later.
about.survey.text: Your feedback is very valuable for us
about.survey.disabled-text: You have already filled in the questionnaire the maximum allowed times.
